H0.text: Beers called Budweiser are named after a city of which modern nation. Germany

H1.text: Beers called Budweiser are named after a city of which modern nation. Austria

H2.text: Beers called Budweiser are named after a city of which modern nation. Poland

H3.text: Beers called Budweiser are named after a city of which modern nation. ČR

A4.text: The Budweiser Budvar Brewery is located in České Budějovice, Czech Republic.

A5.text: Beer has been brewed in Budweis, Bohemia (now České Budějovice, Czech Republic) since 1265.
